params.pollId: The poll to process payouts for
The poll to claim winnings from

params.isDemoMode: Whether this is a free demo poll
params.question: The poll question
params.stakeAmount: Cost per vote in MON (0 for demo mode)

returns.pools: Array of total stakes per option

returns.timeLeft: Seconds until poll ends (0 if ended)

returns.counts: Array of vote counts per option

params.optionId: The option to vote for (0-based index)

batchClaimWinnings(uint256,address[]).notice: Batch claim winnings for multiple winners (gas efficient)

calculatePotentialWinnings(uint256,uint2.notice: Calculate potential winnings if an option wins

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Claim winnings for a resolved poll

demoVote(uint256,uint256,bytes32).notice: Vote in demo mode (free, no wallet required)

demoVotes(uint256,bytes32).notice: Demo votes using temp IDs: pollId => tempId => vote

emergencyResolvePoll(uint256).notice: Emergency function to resolve stuck polls (owner only)

getOptionPools(uint256).notice: Get stake pools for all options

getTimeRemaining(uint256).notice: Get time remaining for a poll

getTotalPool(uint256).notice: Get total pool size for a poll

getUserVote(uint256,address).notice: Get user's vote for a poll

getVoteCounts(uint256).notice: Get vote counts for all options

hasClaimed(uint256,address).notice: Track if user has claimed winnings: pollId => user => claimed?

hasDemoVoted(uint256,bytes32).notice: Demo vote tracking: pollId => tempId => voted?

hasVoted(uint256,address).notice: Track if user has voted: pollId => user => voted?

isPollActive(uint256).notice: Check if a poll is currently active

optionPools(uint256,uint256).notice: Total stake for each option: pollId => optionId => total staked

polls(uint256).notice: Mapping of poll ID to Poll struct

resolvePoll(uint256).notice: Resolve a poll and determine the winner

vote(uint256,uint256).notice: Vote on a poll with MON stake

voteCounts(uint256,uint256).notice: Vote counts for each option: pollId => optionId => count
